segments.text: Why did the teacher criticise Myra in front of the whole class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because Myra was cheating on exams , and she spoke back rudely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think that Myra should have spoken so rudely to the teacher . I know she was angry , but that's still no excuse for rudeness .
segments.speaker: S1
